ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup (Regular, 98% Fat Free or 25% Less Sodium)
des: "Tender corkscrew pasta is cloaked in a creamy mushroom sauce sporting flavors of three cheeses."
ins:
Mix soup, cheeses, milk and black pepper in 1 1/2-qt. casserole.  Stir in pasta.
Bake at 400 degrees F. for 20 min. or until hot.
